role-bc.title: Role of BookingCare
role-bc.help-people: Help patients choose the right doctor and book an appointment quickly.
role-bc.help-people-1: System of good and reputable specialist doctors
role-bc.help-people-2: The information about the doctor has been clearly and accurately verified
role-bc.help-people-3: Schedule an appointment with the correct doctor that the patient has chosen to schedule an appointment with
role-bc.help-people-4: Protecting the rights of patients when going to the doctor
role-bc.support: Support before, during and after the examination.
role-bc.before-exam-1: Reminder of the examination schedule, advice to prepare before the examination
role-bc.during-exam-1: Support to solve problems during examination
role-bc.after-exam-1: Record the patient's opinion after the examination
role-bc.after-exam-2: Support to answer and clarify professional issues

detail-doctor.no-schedule: Currently, the selected date does not have a medical examination schedule. Please choose another date or come back later, thank you very much!
detail-doctor.fee: Choose a time and book (Scheduling fee 0 VND)
detail-doctor.price-note: Get priority treatment before booking through BookingCare. The cost of medical examination for foreigners is

detail-category.paragraph-1: Periodic general health check-up is an effective measure to help screen dangerous diseases at an early stage and advise on the prevention of common diseases, helping to protect health and improve quality of life. health, avoid health concerns.
detail-category.paragraph-2: According to the recommendations of the World Health Organization, people aged 18 years and over should have regular health check-ups every 6 months or once a year in order to detect and treat early diseases in latent stages. Thereby, it is possible to diagnose the potential risks of many dangerous diseases of cardiovascular, respiratory dysfunction, lung, stomach, oropharyngeal cancer or viral hepatitis...
detail-category.paragraph-3: Routine physical examination is especially important in detecting cancers, which have almost no symptoms in the early stages.

modal-booking.header-note: (PLEASE COMPLETE FULL INFORMATION TO SAVE TIME FOR EXAMINATION PROCEDURES)
modal-booking.note-first: The information you provide will be used as medical examination records, when filling in your information, please:
modal-booking.note-first-sub-1: Specify your first and last name, capitalize the first letters, for example: Tran Van Phu
modal-booking.note-first-sub-2: The full name must be exactly the name of the person who comes to the hospital for examination, not the name of the person ordering it.
modal-booking.note-first-sub-3: Fill it out completely and correctly and please double check the information before pressing "Confirm booking"
modal-booking.note-second: Please follow the epidemic prevention regulations (wearing a mask, disinfecting, declaring the epidemiology) when visiting the clinic.
modal-booking.note-third: By confirming your booking, you have fully agreed to our Terms of Service.
